Description: Model squat vase of limestone: with a flat base and a rough copy of a raised external rim. Solid except for a slight depression in the top. The exterior bears patches of black paint.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tomb of Qaa, tomb Q.20 subsidiary burial
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Royal Tombs of the Earliest Dynasties' I, 15, 28, pl.XXXVIII, 5-6.
